Docs.summary: Represents the name of a queue associated with an event on a . This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
This class can be associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> or any other queues used by the Workflow Foundation (WF).
